full_summary:
===============

### Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Reference Number

* PW-23-01021061
* Amendment Number: 4
* Solicitation Number: R122031A
* Solicitation Date: 2023-01-12
* Closing Date for Tenders: 2023-03-03T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-02-24

#### Brief Description

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking proposals from qualified vendors to provide Tier 1 Storage and Backup Services under a Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) arrangement. The contract will be awarded for a two-year period, with an estimated 220 days per year of resource utilization.

#### Background

This requirement is open to qualified TBIPS Holders who have previously secured Tier 1 for Service Professional categories in the National Capital Region. SSC intends to award 1 contract for the provision of System Administrators with Secret level clearance.

#### Information for Tenderers

* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada
* Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON, Canada, K0A 0C3
* Contact: Adamov, Dusan, Phone: 613-294-2380, Email: dusan.adamov@canada.ca

#### Invitation to Propose

The tender description outlines the specific requirements and conditions for the contract. SSC seeks three (3) System Administrators with Secret level security clearance, and reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier.

Secure options are as follows:
